stats.description: Get detailed information about the current state of the LED strip.
stats.title: LED Stats

brightness.description: Set all LEDs to the same brightness between 0 and 100%.
brightness.title: LED Brightness

fill_upper.description: Light all the LEDs in the upper band with the same color.

random.description: Light up all LEDs with random colors.

fill_lower.description: Light all the LEDs in the lower band with the same color.

fill.description: Light all the LEDs with same color.

fill_array.description: Light the LEDs in between given numbers with same color.

fill_middle.description: Light all the LEDs in the middle band with the same color.

dot.description: Light a specific single LED with the given RGB color.

description: A strip of 118 RGB LEDs that can be controlled remotely.
title: DotStarRGBLEDstrip
Hue White Lamp 1
description: This is a Philips Hue White Light Bulb that can be controlled remotely. It is configured for a specific router.

lightInformation.title: State and Attributes Of Light
lightInformation.description: Gets the attributes and state of a given light

state.description: Details the state of the light, see the state table below for more details.

on.description: On/Off state of the light. On=true, Off=false

alert.description: The alert effect, which is a temporary change to the bulb’s state.'l' of lselect stands for loop.

reachable.description: Indicates if a light can be reached by the bridge

type.description: A fixed name describing the type of light

name.description: A unique, editable name given to the light

modelid.description: The hardware model of the light.

swversion.description: An identifier for the software version running on the light

rename.title: Rename Light
rename.description: A light can have its name changed when in any state, including when it is unreachable or off.

set_state.title: Set State
set_state.description: Allows the user to turn the light on and off, modify the hue and effects

on.description: On/Off state of the light. On=true, Off=false

alert.description: The alert effect, which is a temporary change to the bulb’s state.'l' of lselect stands for loop. Presence of lselect ignores transitiontime

transisiontime.description: The duration of the transition from the light’s current state to the new state.

bri_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the brightness.  bri_inc is ignored if the bri attribute is provided.

/lights/4/state/bri_inc.description: Increments or decrements the value of the brightness.  bri_inc is ignored if the bri attribute is provided.

/lights/4/state/on.description: On/Off state of the light. On=true, Off=false

/lights/4/state/alert.description: The alert effect, which is a temporary change to the bulb’s state.'l' of lselect stands for loop.

/lights/4/state/transisiontime.description: The duration of the transition from the light’s current state to the new state.
